```{r setup, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse); library(janitor); library(GGally)
source(file.path("utils","data_loading.R"))
df <- read_csv_safely(file.path("data","iris_sample.csv"))
```
## Glimpse
```{r}
glimpse(df)
```
## Pairs Plot
```{r}
GGally::ggpairs(df, columns=1:4, aes(color=species))
```
